entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:31AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf, High Winds, And Heavy Rain Early This Week... A strong low pressure system is expected to bring elevated surf to south and west facing shores from the Yukon Delta to Point Hope Monday and Tuesday. At this time, the highest water levels look to be Monday night and Tuesday for areas south of Nome. Areas north of Nome can expect the highest water on Tuesday and Tuesday
